transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Hello. Haanji haanji madam. Surendra ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haanji haanji. Sir, main IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu, kya aapka main shubham team se.
Customer: Haanji haanji.
Executive: Sir, aapki services hamare saath run ho rahi hai. Usi ke regarding maine call kiya tha. Abhi baat ho sakti hai sir?
Customer: Madam, ek ek second phone rakh dunga. Aise ek minute hold rakhna, ek minute bas.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Haanji madam.
Executive: Ji ji sir. Sir, services aapke saath kaisi chal rahi hai services vagerah?
Customer: Nahi chal rahi madam. Main band karana maine paise wapas lene IndiaMART se. Mera main kai baar phone-foon kar hata hu. Koi mere ko lead hi nahi aa rahi kuch.
Customer: Maine band karana madam ye wala.
Executive: Sir, kyu matlab aisa kya hua?
Customer: Madam, maine March ka chalu karaya hua hai. March ka maine shuru kiya hua hai aur mere koi keyword hi nahi jod rahe kuch tuccha sa kaam jisko hum kehte hai mamuli sa kaam hota hai. Wo kaam hai jo main product bana raha hu tractor ke fuel cock banata hu. Fuel cock tractor fuel cock sirf keyword saath mein jodna hai. Aapki IndiaMART team ke itne gande behad najayaz bevkuf insan bharti kiye hue hai andar jinse ek keyword nahi add hua. Pata nahi kis cheez ki tankha lete hai inko bahar nikalo inko sabhi ko. March mahine se lekar aaj tak dekho main kitni baar request kar chuka hu mera fuel cock ka keyword lagao jab wo koi mera product ko search karta hai motorcycle ka part aa jata hai. Jo mere ko leads aap March se lekar aaj tak lead check karo jo main cheez banata hu uski lead hi nahi aati. Koi aave hi faltu mein koi aa raha hai assembly de do koi kehta spindle de do koi kehta kuch lead bekar si lead aati rehti hai. Matlab pehle ek ladki thi Jalandhar ki wo wo lare lagati rahi paanch che mahine. Ab Ujjwal hai wo kabhi ghar par hota hai kabhi bahar hota hai. Humko hum humko kuch nahi samajh lag raha kuch. Yani ki humko aaj tak koi ek grahak nahi mila. Aur ulta ek bande ne humko luta bhi hai beech mein IndiaMART ke ek customer ban ke. Usne chalo usne 5 ya 6.5 lakh ka order diya tha. Humne sample bheja uska paisa manga ₹250. Wo kehta hai aap 6.5 lakh ka order hai. To wo gayab hi ho gaya IndiaMART se. Humne piece bhej diya sab kuch kar diya IndiaMART se gayab. Humne uski complaint bhi ki hui hai beech mein. Lekin hai nahi kuch anpadh jaise bhar mein aapki. Sir, us cheez ke liye main aapko sorry karti hu ki agar aapko hamari team ki side pe kuch aisa hua hai. Aap mujhe bata de main kar deti hu aapke keywords vagerah add usme aisa kuch bhi nahi hai kyuki usme zyada time nahi lagta hai. Main hi kar deti hu usme. Madam, iske mere jo usme fuel cock maine paanch che Ujjwal aap mere ko hello likh ke bhejo. Main aapko paanch char apne keyword jo Ujjwal ko bheje hai wohi aapko bhejta hu. Add kar sakte ho kar do matlab kam se kam do char hazaar to batwa ke do. ₹40,000 laga hua hai mera. Kam se kam kam se kam utne paise to pure kar do kam se kam koi do char paanch grahak to mile.
Executive: Ji ji bilkul sir. Sir agar aapne paise lagaye to aapko yaha se paise zarur niklenge. Aisa nahi hai jis fuel cock wala hai na usme maine abhi ek keyword add kiya hai tractor spare parts karke. Uske alawa ye. Nahi madam usse nahi hoga usse usse usse nahi hoga madam. Meri baat dhyan se suno tractor dekho tractor tractor aapne road pe dekha hai. Hai na usme kitna kuch laga hota hai hai na. Thik hai mere ko leads aa rahi hai tractor part ki. Lekin man lo main hi khud man lo aap isko IndiaMART ko band kar do. Apna mobile kholo ya koi aur window kholo naya window kholo us pe aap likho STI fuel cock. Ya aap likho fuel cock. Aapko dikhna pehle to motorcycle ke aa jayenge. Thik hai agar mera naam hi nahi logo man lo logo ko pata hai pure India ko pata hai STI kya hai hai na. Man lo STI fuel cock koi likhta hai to wo Google pe search hi nahi ho raha to fayda kya hai madam uska. To Google khud paise maang raha hai usko paise dekar jitni marzi add kara lo hai na. Ji ji to IndiaMART ka fayda kya hai batao mere ko. Agar acha agar ghum fir ke hum pahunch hi jate hai tractor fuel cock ke upar to wo jo mera product hai wo nazar hi nahi jo jinko main deta hu unke nazar aate hai. Meri farm ka naam hi nahi jaldi aata. Koshish to hum karte rehte hai.
Executive: Thik hai sir main ek kaam kar rahi hu main aapko WhatsApp pe apni side se hello send kar rahi hu aap mujhe wo sari keywords vagerah share kar do main add karwa deti hu.
Customer: Alright.
Executive: Haan. To thik hai na okay. Okay. Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund for IndiaMART subscription.

- No relevant leads, only irrelevant inquiries.

- Keywords not added to product listing.

- Feels cheated by a customer via IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the issues faced.

- Executive offered to add keywords to the listing.

- Executive will contact via WhatsApp to get keywords.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share keywords via WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, keywords, subscription, google search
